sentences.en: "Can you walk all right?" the nurse asked him.
sentences.cn: “你走路有困难吗？”护士问他。

sentences.en: "Thank you doctor," said the nurse with a simper.
sentences.cn: “谢谢你，医生，”护士傻笑着说。

sentences.en: a community nurse
sentences.cn: 社区护士

sentences.en: A doctor and a nurse caught hold of his arms.
sentences.cn: 一名医生和一名护士抓住了他的双臂。

sentences.en: a male nurse
sentences.cn: 男护士

sentences.en: A patient going through acute detox will have an assigned nurse nearby.
sentences.cn: 接受急性脱瘾治疗的病人身边会有一名指派的护士看护。

sentences.en: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )
sentences.cn: 精神病院护士

sentences.en: a senior nurse
sentences.cn: 高级护士

sentences.en: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.cn: 实习护士

sentences.en: At seven o'clock the night nurse came in to relieve her.
sentences.cn: 7点钟的时候夜班护士来接她的班。

sentences.en: Every morning she got up early with the children and the nurse.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨，她和孩子、保姆一起早早起床。

sentences.en: He would have a nurse in constant attendance day and night.
sentences.cn: 会有一位护士日夜不间断地陪护着他。

sentences.en: He’s been nursing an elderly relative.
sentences.cn: 他一直在照顾一位年老的亲戚。

sentences.en: Michael was showing the nurse how to suction his saliva.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔正给护士示范如何把他的唾液吸出来。

sentences.en: Most authorities recommend letting the baby nurse whenever it wants.
sentences.cn: 大部分权威人士建议婴儿饿了就随时喂奶。

sentences.en: Shaw has been nursing an injury, and will not play on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 肖一直在养伤，星期天将不参加比赛。

sentences.en: She volunteered as a nurse in a soldiers' rest-home.
sentences.cn: 她自告奋勇到士兵疗养院当护士。

sentences.en: She wore a little nurse's hat on her head to identify her.
sentences.cn: 她头戴一顶小护士帽，很容易辨认。

sentences.en: The door burst open and an angry young nurse appeared.
sentences.cn: 门突然被推开，一名怒气冲冲的年轻护士出现在门口。

sentences.en: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
sentences.cn: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.en: The nurse shook the thermometer and put it under my armpit.
sentences.cn: 护士把体温计甩了甩，然后放到了我的腋下。

sentences.en: The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.cn: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.en: The young nurse pulled a face at the Matron's retreating figure.
sentences.cn: 看着护士长离去的身影，这个年轻的护士做了个鬼脸。

sentences.en: We're going to go home and nurse our colds.
sentences.cn: 我们打算回家调养感冒。

words.tran_cn: 养成；教育；培养（形容词nurturant）；养育

phrases.tran_cn: 护理师，护师；执业护师，开业护士

trans.tran_cn: 护士，看护，奶妈，保姆，阿妈，保育员，保护人，培养者，养成所，发祥地，[植]保护树，[虫]保护虫，保育虫，[动]世代交替的无性期的个体
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital
someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital
to look after someone who is ill or injured
